about: With four years of experience in software development and testing, I am driven by innovation, quality, and efficiency. Currently, I work on system development using Angular, C#, and .NET, always aiming to exceed goals and optimize processes. I am involved in building a bus fleet management system, utilizing C#, .NET, ASP.NET Core, and Entity Framework Core. The project entails creating scalable RESTful APIs for efficient vehicle management, including API architecture and development, database integration, implementation of security and authentication, as well as intuitive user interfaces. Throughout my career, I have developed skills in documentation and test execution, including requirements analysis, test plan creation, and manual test execution. I also gained advanced experience in test automation with TestComplete, ensuring quality and reliability in the projects I worked on. Continuously seeking challenges that expand my knowledge, I am dedicated to contributing to the success of projects. In my free time, I'm a fan of souls-like games.
